name: emby
description: Emby is a media server platform that organizes and streams personal video, music, and photos to many devices. It offers apps for TVs and mobiles, a web interface, user profiles, and features like live TV and DVR for home media setups.
features: Media Organization: Automatically organize video, music, and photos. Beautiful library management.
Multi-Device Streaming: Apps for TVs, phones, and web browsers. Watch anywhere, anytime.
User Profiles: Separate accounts with personalized recommendations. Family-friendly setup.
Live TV & DVR: Record and watch live television. Complete home entertainment.
Remote Access: Stream your media from anywhere securely. Your content, everywhere.
Self-Hosted: Complete control over your media server. No subscription fees ever.
